T11bsa066_u:12: iha prekṣāpūrvakāriṇaḥ prayojanādiśūnye na kvacitpravartanta ityato 'dhikṛtaśāstrasya prayojanādipradarśanena prekṣāvatāṃ pravṛttyarthamiti
T11bsa066_u:14: śāstramārabhyate ityukte saṃbhavatyevaṃvādī paraḥ- nārabdhavyamidaṃ prayojanarahitatvāt unmattakavākyavat /
T11bsa066_u:16: tathā asaṃbaddhatvāt daśa dāḍimāni ṣaḍapūpāḥ kuṇḍamajājinaṃ palalapiṇḍaṃ sara kīṭiketyādivākyavat /
T11bsa066_u:18: ayaṃ cābhidheyaprayojane eva darśayati sākṣāt saṃbandhaṃ tu sāmarthyena /
T11bsa066_u:19: yathā caitadevaṃ tathā sukhapratipattyarthamevameva leśato vyākhyāya darśayiṣyāmaḥ //
T11bsa066_u:22: vyākhyāṃ vihāya tattvajñaiḥ sā coktā padavākyayoḥ //
T11bsa066_u:25: sādhanam dūṣaṇam ca eva sābhāsam parasaṃvide pratyakṣam anumānam ca sābhāsam tu ātmasaṃvide iti padāni //
T11bsa066_u:27: sādhyate aneneti siddhirvā sādhayatīti vā sādhanam /
T11bsa066_u:37: nanu vakṣyati sādhanadoṣodbhāvanāni dūṣaṇānīti tadetatkatham / ucyate /
T11bsa066_u:38: sādhanābhāsa eva kiṃcitsāmyena sādhanopacārādadoṣaḥ ityetacca tatraiva nirloṭhayiṣyāmaḥ /
T11bsa066_u:51: parasaṃvide ityatra pare prāśnikāḥ saṃvedanaṃ saṃvid avabodha ityarthaḥ /
T11bsa066_u:52: pareṣāṃ saṃvit parasaṃvit tasyai parasaṃvide parāvabodhāya /
T11bsa066_u:57: sādhanadūṣaṇe eva sābhāse parasaṃvide parāvabodhāya na pratyakṣānumāne /
T11bsa066_u:59: yathā pārtha eva dhanurdharaḥ pārthe dhanurdhārayati sati ko 'nyo dhanurdhārayati iti //
T11bsa066_u:60: pratyakṣam ityatra akṣamindriyaṃ tataśca pratigatamakṣaṃ pratyakṣaṃ kāryatvenendriyaṃ prati gatamityarthaḥ /
T11bsa066_u:61: idaṃ ca vakṣyati pratyakṣaṃ kalpanāpoḍham ityādi /
T11bsa066_u:62: tathā mīyate aneneti mānaṃ paricchedyata ityarthaḥ /
T11bsa066_u:78: ātmā ceha cittacaittasaṃtānarūpaḥ parigṛhyate na tu paraparikalpito nittyatvādidharmā /
T11bsa066_u:82: pratyakṣānumāne eva sābhāse ātmasaṃvide ātmāvabodhāya na sādhanadūṣaṇe ātmasaṃvitphalatvāt tayoḥ /
T11bsa066_u:83: āha nanu sādhanamapi vastuto 'numānameva tataścānumānamityādyukte sādhanābhidhānaṃ na yujyate asminvā prāgukte anumānābhidhānamiti /
T11bsa066_u:94: iha ca sādhanādayo 'ṣṭau padārthāḥ abhidheyatayā uktāḥ /
T11bsa066_u:100: āha- yadyevaṃ parasaṃvittyātmasaṃvittyoḥ prakaraṇārthaparijñānena vyavahitatvādaprayojanatvamiti / na /
T11bsa066_u:113: idamiha śrotaṇāṃ prayojanamuktaṃ kartustarhi kiṃ prayojanamiti vācyam /
T11bsa066_u:132: tatra yathoddeśastathā nirdeśa iti kṛtvā sādhanasvarūpāvadhāraṇāyāha //
T11bsa066_u:135: tatra teṣu sādhanādiṣu sādhanaṃ tāvannirdhāryate iti /
T11bsa066_u:137: atra guṇanimittaṃ sādhanatvena guṇena nirdhāryate iti /
T11bsa066_u:157: na punaryathā lambakarṇaḥ brāhmaṇādayo varṇā iti /
T11bsa066_u:161: na punarādīyate ityādiḥ yathā brāhmaṇādayo varṇā ityadāviti /
T11bsa066_u:162: tataḥ susthitamidaṃ pakṣaḥ ādiryeṣāṃ te pakṣādayaḥ //
T11bsa066_u:166: iha ca yadā sādhyate 'neneti sādhanaṃ karaṇābhidhānārthaḥ sādhanaśabdastadā pakṣopalakṣitāni hetutvādivacanāni sādhanam /
T11bsa066_u:168: yadā punarbhāvasādhanaḥ siddhiḥ sādhanamiti tadā pakṣādivacanajanyaṃ pratipādyagataṃ jñānameva sādhanam /
T11bsa066_u:172: yadā tu kartṛsādhanaḥ sādhayatīti sādhanaṃ tadā pakṣādivacanānyeva kartṛtvena vivakṣyante pratipādyasaṃtāne jñānotpādakatvāt iti /
T11bsa066_u:178: uktaṃ ca diṅnāgācāryeṇa sādhanamiti caikavacananirdeśaḥ samastasādhanatvakhyāpanārthaḥ /
T11bsa066_u:181: idaṃ ca na jñāyate kiṃ kārakamuta vyañjakam /
T11bsa066_u:207: ye yathoktāḥ prāśnikāḥ kathaṃ teṣāṃ kaścidapratīto 'rtha iti /
T11bsa066_u:211: nanu cātra cāturthyā kriyayā ceti vaktavyalakṣaṇayā bhavitavyaṃ tatkimartha ṣaṣṭhyatrocyate /
T11bsa066_u:226: dharmāḥ kṛtakatvādayaste 'sya vidyante iti dharmī śabdādiḥ /
T11bsa066_u:235: iha dharmiṇastāvatprasiddhatā yuktā viśeṣaṇasya tvanityatvāderna yujyate /
T11bsa066_u:240: iha prasiddhatā viśeṣaṇasya na tasminneva dharmiṇi samāśrīyate kiṃtu dharmyantare ghaṭādau /
T11bsa066_u:247: īpsitaḥ abhimataḥ iṣṭa icchāyā vyāpta ityarthaḥ /
T11bsa066_u:248: iha ca viśeṣaṇasya vyavacchedakatvātprasiddho dharmītyanenāprasiddhaviśeṣaṇasya pakṣābhāsasya vyavacchedo draṣṭavyaḥ /
T11bsa066_u:254: etena yadyapi kvacicchāstre sthtiaḥ sādhanamāha tacchāstrakāreṇa tasmindharmiṇyanekadharmābhyupagame
T11bsa066_u:255: 'pi yastadānena vādinā dharmaḥ sādhayitumiṣṭaḥ sa eva sādhyo netara ityuktaṃ bhavatīti
T11bsa066_u:262: ityanena dharmaviśiṣṭo dharmī pakṣa ityāveditaṃ bhavati /
T11bsa066_u:263: tataśca na dharmamātraṃ na dharmī kevalaḥ na svatantramubhayaṃ na ca tayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ kiṃtu dharmadharmiṇorviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāva iti bhāvārthaḥ
T11bsa066_u:264: iha coktalakṣaṇayoge satyapyaśrāvaṇaḥ śabda ityevamādīnāmapi pratyakṣāviruddhānāṃ pakṣatvaprāptyātivyāptirnāma lakṣaṇadoṣaḥ prāpnotītyastannivṛttyarthamāha
T11bsa066_u:277: trīṇi rūpāṇi yasyāsau trirūpaḥ trisvabhāva ityarthaḥ /
T11bsa066_u:278: ekasya vastuno nānātvamapaśyan pṛcchaka āha kiṃ punastrirūpyam /
T11bsa066_u:282: evaṃ pṛcchakena pṛṣṭaḥ sannāhācāryaḥ pakṣadharmatvaṃ sapakṣe sattvaṃ vipakṣe cāsattvameva /
T11bsa066_u:300: tathā ca satyekāntato vipakṣavyāvṛttāḥ sapakṣaikadeśavyāpino 'pi prayatnānantarīyakatvādayaḥ samyagghetava evetyāveditaṃ bhavati //
T11bsa066_u:301: sapakṣe sattvamityādi yaduktaṃ tatra sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ svarūpamajānāno vineyaḥ pṛcchati /
T11bsa066_u:302: kaḥ punaḥ sapakṣaḥ ko vā vipakṣa iti /
T11bsa066_u:335: iha ca sādhyapratibandhatvāt sādhanasya tadapi nāstīti gamyate /
T11bsa066_u:345: kṛtakatvaṃ prayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ vā anityādau heturiti yogaḥ /
T11bsa066_u:347: apekṣitaparavyāpāro hi bhāvaḥ svabhāvaniṣpattau kṛtaka iti /
T11bsa066_u:351: tasya prayatnānantaraṃ tatra bhāvo jāta iti vā prayatnānantarīyaḥ /
T11bsa066_u:359: ayaṃ ca hetuḥ kiṃ pakṣadharma eva na tu pakṣasyaiva dharmaḥ /
T11bsa066_u:363: tathā saphala evāstvanyayogavyavacchedaḥ yathā pārtha eva dhanurdharaḥ /
T11bsa066_u:364: anena tu sādhāraṇādīnāṃ navānāmapi hetvābhāsānāṃ vyāvṛttiḥ /
T11bsa066_u:366: yadi sapakṣa evāsti tataśca tadvyatirekeṇānyatra pakṣe 'pyabhāvāt dharmatvānupapattiḥ /
T11bsa066_u:370: yadyevaṃ vipakṣe nāsti eveti tṛtīyamavadhāraṇaṃ kimartham? /
T11bsa066_u:374: anvayavyatirekayorekamapi rūpamuktaṃ kathaṃ nu nāma dvitīyasyākṣepakaṃ syāditi /
T11bsa066_u:385: dve vidhe yasya sa dvividhastadeva dvaividhyam /
T11bsa066_u:387: samāno dharmo yasyāsau sadharmā sadharmaṇo bhāvaḥ sādharmyaṃ tena /
T11bsa066_u:388: visadṛśo dharmo yasyāsau vidharmā vidharmaṇo bhāvaḥ vaidharmyaṃ tena /
T11bsa066_u:394: sapakṣa uktalakṣaṇastasmiṃścāstitvaṃ vidyamānatvaṃ khyāpyate pratipādyate vacanena /
T11bsa066_u:396: yatkṛtakaṃ tadanityaṃ yathā ghaṭādiḥ iti sugamam /
T11bsa066_u:422: na tu bhāvādanyo 'bhāvo nāma vastusvarūpo 'sti evaṃ nityaśabdenātretyādi dārṣṭāntike 'pi bhāvitameva //
T11bsa066_u:433: yat kṛtakaṃ tadanityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā ghaṭādiriti sapakṣānugamavacanam /
T11bsa066_u:444: tatrāpi pakṣādivacanāni sādhanamiti pakṣasyopalakṣaṇatvātprathamaṃ pakṣa uktaḥ /
T11bsa066_u:460: iha punaḥ pratyakṣaśabdena tatparicchinno dharmaḥ parigṛhyate śālikuḍavanyāyāt /
T11bsa066_u:469: ayaṃ ca sādhyamānastatraiva dharmiṇi pratyakṣaprasiddhena śrāvaṇatvena virudhyate iti pratyakṣaviruddhaḥ /
T11bsa066_u:471: śrāvaṇatvaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇatvātpratyakṣagamyameva na bhavati kathaṃ pratyakṣaprasiddhadharmaviruddhaḥ? iti /
T11bsa066_u:474: atra ca bahu vaktavyaṃ tattu nocyate /
T11bsa066_u:485: vaiśeṣiko 'hamityevaṃ pakṣaparigrahaṃ kṛtvā yadā śabdasya nityatvaṃ pratijānite tadāgamavirūddhaḥ /
T11bsa066_u:487: uktaṃ ca buddhimatpūrvā vākyakṛtirvede tadvacanādāmnāyasya prāmāṇyamityādi //
T11bsa066_u:492: sa ca sādhyamānastatraiva dharmiṇi lokaprasiddhaśucitvena nirākriyata iti /
T11bsa066_u:501: sa ca sādhyamānastatraiva dharmiṇi svavacanaprasiddhena mātṛtvena viruddhyate /
T11bsa066_u:502: virodhaśca mātṛśabdena prasavadharmiṇī vanitocyate vandhyāśabdena tadviparītā /
T11bsa066_u:506: bauddhasya sāṃkhyaṃ prati vināśī śabde iti /
T11bsa066_u:513: ayaṃ ca bauddhasya sāṃkhyaṃ prati aprasiddhiviśeṣaṇaḥ /
T11bsa066_u:527: ato dṛṣṭāntaṃ prasādhya prayogaḥ kartavya iti /
T11bsa066_u:530: tathā aprasiddhaviśeṣyo yathā sāṃkhyasya bauddhaṃ prati cetana ātmeti /
T11bsa066_u:534: iti pakṣaḥ sāṃkhyasya bauddhaṃ prati aprasiddhaviśeṣyaḥ /
T11bsa066_u:545: tathāhi- tantavaḥ paṭasya samacāyikāraṇaṃ tantusaṃyogo 'samavāyikāraṇaṃ turīvemādayastu nimittakāraṇam /
T11bsa066_u:550: na tasyātmā viśeṣyaḥ siddho nāpi samavāyikāraṇaṃ viśeṣaṇam /
T11bsa066_u:553: tathā prasiddhasaṃbandho yathā śrāvaṇaḥ śabda iti /
T11bsa066_u:554: prasiddho vādiprativādinoravipratipattyā sthitaḥ saṃbandho dharmadharmilakṣaṇo yasmin sa tathāvidhaḥ /
T11bsa066_u:565: dharmasvarūpasya nirākaraṇaṃ tattathā mukhamiva mukhaṃ dvāramiti bhāvaḥ /
T11bsa066_u:575: viphalasya bhāvo vaiphalyaṃ sādhanasya vaiphalyaṃ sādhanavaiphalyaṃ tasmātsādhanavaiphalyataḥ /
T11bsa066_u:589: asiddhaḥ sidhyati sa siddhaḥ pratītaḥ na siddhaḥ asiddhaḥ apratītaḥ /
T11bsa066_u:596: anyatarasya vādinaḥ prativādino vā asiddha anyatarāsiddhaḥ //
T11bsa066_u:605: śabdānityatve sādhye anityaḥ śabdaḥ ityetasmin cākṣuṣatvāditi /
T11bsa066_u:608: tathāhi- cākṣuṣatvaṃ na vādinaḥ prasiddhaṃ nāpi prativādinaḥ /
T11bsa066_u:612: vartate kṛtakatvādityayaṃ hetuḥ śabdābhivyaktivādinaṃ mīmāṃsakaṃ kāpilaṃ vā pratyanyatarāsiddhaḥ /
T11bsa066_u:613: tathāhi- na tasya tālvoṣṭhapuṭādibhiḥ kriyate śabdaḥ kiṃtvabhivyajyata iti //
T11bsa066_u:615: bāṣpo jalādiprabhavaḥ sa ādiryasya reṇuvartyādeḥ sa bāṣpādistasya bhāvaḥ sattā tena bāṣpādibhāvena /
T11bsa066_u:616: saṃdihyamānaḥ kimayaṃ dhūma uta bāṣpa uta reṇuvartiriti saṃdehamāpadyamānaḥ /
T11bsa066_u:621: niścito hi dhūmo dhūmatvena hutavahaṃ gamayati nāniścita iti /
T11bsa066_u:627: saṃkhyā parimāṇaṃ pṛthaktvaṃ saṃyogo vibhāgaḥ śabdeśceti //
T11bsa066_u:632: pañca imāni bhikṣavaḥ saṃjñāmātraṃ saṃvṛtimātraṃ pratijñāmātraṃ vyavahāramātraṃ kalpanāmātram /
T11bsa066_u:634: atītaḥ addhā anāgataḥ addhā pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ ākāśaṃ pugdala iti /
T11bsa066_u:635: nanu cānyo 'pyasti asiddhaḥ sa ca dvidhā /
T11bsa066_u:658: ṣaṭ prakārā asyeti ṣaṭprakāraḥ ṣaḍ vidhaityarthaḥ //
T11bsa066_u:665: dvayorbahūnāṃ vā yaḥ sāmānyaḥ sa sādhāraṇaḥ /
T11bsa066_u:666: pramīyate iti prameyo jñeya ityarthaḥ tadbhāvaḥ prameyatvaṃ tasmātprameyatvāt pramāṇaparicchedyatvāt /
T11bsa066_u:673: nityaścānityaśca nityānityau nityānityau ca tau pakṣau ca nityānityapakṣau /
T11bsa066_u:678: kiṃ ghaṭavat prameyatvādanityaḥ śabdaḥ āhosvidākāśavat prameyatvānnitya iti prakaṭārthaṃ darśayati /
T11bsa066_u:690: sādhāraṇavilakṣaṇaḥ asādhāraṇaḥ asāmānyaḥ pakṣadharmaḥ san sapakṣavipakṣābhyāṃ vyāvṛtta ityarthaḥ /
T11bsa066_u:696: tatredaṃ śrāvaṇatvaṃ svadharmiṇaṃ vihāya na sapakṣe ākāśādau nāpi vipakṣe ghaṭādau vartata iti saṃśayanimittam /
T11bsa066_u:704: yadasti tena nityena vā bhavitavyamanityena vā nānyathā /
T11bsa066_u:711: yadi tadanyatra nitye vānitye vopalabdhaṃ bhavati tatastabdalenetaratrāpi niścayo yujyate nānyathā /
T11bsa066_u:718: samānaḥ pakṣaḥ sapakṣaḥ tasyaikadeśaḥ sapakṣaikadeśaḥ tasminvṛttirasyeti sapakṣaikadeśavṛttiḥ /
T11bsa066_u:719: tathā visadṛśaḥ pakṣo vipakṣastaṃ vyāptuṃ śīlamasyeti vipakṣavyāpī /
T11bsa066_u:764: upanyastaḥ san tathāvidhārthānirākṛteḥ pratiyoginaṃ na vyabhicaratīti bhāvaḥ /
T11bsa066_u:766: anye tu viruddhaścāsāvavyabhicārī ca viruddhāvyabhicārīti vyācakṣate /
T11bsa066_u:773: anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvādghaṭavaditi vaiśeṣikeṇokte mīmāṃsaka āha /
T11bsa066_u:775: śabdatvaṃ hi nāma veṇuvīṇāmṛdaṅgapaṇavādibhedabhinneṣu sarvaśabdeṣu śabda ityabhinnābhidhānapratyayanibandhanaṃ sāmānyaviśeṣasaṃjñitaṃ nityamiti
T11bsa066_u:777: ekatra dharmiṇi ubhayoḥ kṛtakatvaśrāvaṇatvayoḥ saṃśayahetutvāt saṃdehahetutvā /
T11bsa066_u:778: tathā caikatra dharmiṇi kṛtakatvaśrāvaṇatvākhyau hetu saṃdehaṃ kurutaḥ kiṃ kṛtakatvādghaṭavadanityaḥ āhosvicchrāvaṇatvācchabdatvavannityaḥ iti
T11bsa066_u:779: evaṃ saṃdehahetutve pratipādite paraścodayati kiṃ samastayoḥ saṃdehahetutvam uta vyastayoḥ /
T11bsa066_u:791: sa cānenāṃśenācāryeṇa bhinna upātta iti tasmādadoṣaḥ /
T11bsa066_u:800: tathā hyayaṃ dharmasvarūpādiviparītasādhanārddharmeṇa dharmiṇā vā virudhyata eveti catuḥprakāraścaturbhedaḥ /
T11bsa066_u:808: tasya svarūpamasādhāraṇāmātmalakṣaṇa dharmasvarūpaṃ tasya viparītasādhana iti samāsaḥ /
T11bsa066_u:811: yathā nitya śabdaḥ kṛtakatvāt prayatnānantarīyakatvādvā ityayaṃ heturvipakṣa eva bhāvadviruddhaḥ /
T11bsa066_u:817: āha ayamapakṣadharmatvādasiddhānna viśiṣyate kathaṃ viruddha iti? /
T11bsa066_u:828: dharmaviśeṣaviparītasādhana ityasyodāharaṇaṃ yathā parārthāścakṣurādayaḥ saṃghātatvāt śayanāsanādyaṅgavat iti /
T11bsa066_u:837: tatra dvayorbahūnāṃ vā melakaḥ saṃghātastasya bhāvaḥ saṃghātatvaṃ tasmātsaṃghātatvāt /
T11bsa066_u:842: yathaitadaṅgāni saṃghātatvāddevadattādiparārthāni vartante evaṃ cakṣurādayo 'pīti bhāvārthaḥ /
T11bsa066_u:845: ayaṃ hetuḥ saṃghātatvalakṣano yathā yena prakāreṇa pārārthyaṃ parārthabhāvaṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ sādhayati tathā tenaiva prakāreṇa saṃhatatvamapi sāvayavatvamapi parasyātmanaḥ sādhayati /
T11bsa066_u:849: ubhayatreti parārthe saṃhatatve ca avyabhicārād gamakatvādityarthaḥ /
T11bsa066_u:850: tathā caivamapi vaktuṃ śakyata eva saṃhataparārthāścakṣurādayaḥ saṃghātatvāt śayanāsanādyaṅgavaditi /
T11bsa066_u:851: śayanāsaṇādyaṅgāni hi saṃhatasya karacaraṇorugrīvādimata evārthaṃ kurvanti nānyasya /
T11bsa066_u:853: āha vipakṣa eva bhāvādviruddha iti sāmānyaṃ viruddhalakṣaṇaṃ tatkathamihopapadyate? iti /
T11bsa066_u:855: asaṃhataparavipakṣo hi saṃhata iti tatraiva vṛttidarśanāt /
T11bsa066_u:866: tataḥ pṛthvyāpastejovāyurākāśaṃ kālo digātmā mana iti dravyāṇi /
T11bsa066_u:868: rūparasagandhasparśasaṃkhyāparimāṇāni pṛthaktvaṃ saṃyogavibhāgau paratvāparatve buddhiḥ sukhaduḥkhecchādveṣāḥ prayatnaśceti sūtroktāḥ /
T11bsa066_u:869: caśabdāt dravatvaṃ gurutvaṃ saṃskāraḥ sneho dharmādharmau śabdaśceti /
T11bsa066_u:875: tatra paraṃ sattā bhāvo mahāsāmānyamiti cocyate /
T11bsa066_u:884: ekadravyavattvādityatra ekaṃ ca taddravyaṃ ca ekadravyamasyāstīti āśrayabhūtamiti ekadravyavān /
T11bsa066_u:888: vaiśeṣikasya hi adravyaṃ dravyaṃ anekadravyaṃ ca dravyam /
T11bsa066_u:893: ityato dravyalakṣaṇavilakṣaṇatvāt na dravyaṃ bhāva iti /
T11bsa066_u:896: dravyatvaṃ hi navasu dravyeṣu vartamānatvātsāmānyaṃ guṇakarmabhyo vyāvartamānatvādviśeṣaḥ /
T11bsa066_u:898: tataśca sāmānyaṃ ca tadviśeṣaśca sa iti sāmānyaviśeṣastena tulyaṃ vartata iti sāmānyaviśeṣavat /
T11bsa066_u:901: yathā navasu dravyeṣu pratyekaṃ vartamānaṃ dravyaṃ na bhavati kiṃtu sāmānyaviśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ dravyatvameva evaṃ bhāvo 'pītyabhiprāyaḥ /
T11bsa066_u:902: āha yadi nāma dravyaṃ na bhavati tathāpi guṇobhaviṣyati karma ca ityetadapi nirācikīrṣurāha /
T11bsa066_u:904: tataśca na guṇo bhāvaḥ guṇeṣu bhāvād guṇatvavat /
T11bsa066_u:905: yadi ca bhāvo guṇaḥ syānna tarhi guṇeṣu varteta nirguṇatvād guṇānām /
T11bsa066_u:908: tathā na karma bhāvaḥ karmasu bhāvātkarmatvavat /
T11bsa066_u:909: yadi ca bhāvaḥ karma syāt na tarhi karmasu varteta niṣkarmakatvātkarmaṇām /
T11bsa066_u:914: ayaṃ ca hetustriprakāro 'pi yathā dravyādipratiṣedhaṃ sādhayati tathā bhāvasya dharmiṇo 'bhāvatvamapi sādhayati /
T11bsa066_u:920: yatathaidbaktuṃ śakyate na dravyaṃ bhāvaḥ ekadravyatvāt dravyatvavat evamidamapi śakyate bhāvo bhāva eva na bhavati ekadravyatvāt dravyatvavat
T11bsa066_u:922: evaṃ na guṇaḥ guṇeṣu bhāvāt guṇatvavat /
T11bsa066_u:923: atrāpi bhāvo bhāva eva na bhavati guṇeṣu bhāvāt guṇatvavat /
T11bsa066_u:925: evaṃ na karma bhāvaḥ karmasu bhāvāt karmatvavat atrāpi bhāvo bhāva eva na bhavati karmasu bhāvāt karmatvavat /
T11bsa066_u:928: āha ayamasiddhānna viśiṣyate iti kathaṃ viruddhaḥ? /
T11bsa066_u:930: na bhāvo nāma dravyādivyatiriktaḥ kaścidasti saugatānām /
T11bsa066_u:933: kiṃtu paraprasiddho 'pi vipakṣamātravyāpī viruddha iti nidarśanārthatvāt /
T11bsa066_u:937: tathāpyanityaḥ śabdaḥ pākyatvādghatavat pākyaḥ śabda iti viruddhapreraṇāyāṃ kṛtakatvānvitāpākyapaṭādidṛṣṭāntāntarasāmarthyāttannivṛttyā na viruddhatā
T11bsa066_u:944: yata uktaṃ saditi yato dravyaguṇakarmasu sā sattā /
T11bsa066_u:946: ayameva heturekadravyavattvākhyaḥ asminneva pūrvapakṣe na dravyaṃ bhāva ityādilakṣaṇe
T11bsa066_u:947: asyaiva dharmiṇo bhāvākhyasya yo viśeṣo dharmaḥ satpratyayakartṛtvaṃ nāma tadviparitamasatpratyayakartṛtvamapi sādhayati /
T11bsa066_u:949: tathā hyetadapi vaktuṃ śakyata eva bhāvaḥ satpratyayakartā na bhavati ekadravyavattvādravyatvat /
T11bsa066_u:958: tatra yathā dṛṣṭānto dvividhaḥ evaṃ mūlabhedavyapekṣayā tadābhāso 'pi tathā /
T11bsa066_u:965: tatra sādharmyeṇa tāvaddṛṣṭāntābhāsaḥ pañcaprakāraḥ pañcabhedaḥ tadyathā /
T11bsa066_u:970: na tu bahubrīhau niṣṭhāntaṃ pūrvaṃ nipatatīti kṛtvāsiddhasādhanadharmā iti /
T11bsa066_u:973: anye tu sādhanadharmeṇa rahitatvādasiddhaḥ sādhanadharmāsiddhaḥ iti vyācakṣate /
T11bsa066_u:977: sa cāvasaraḥ prāpta eveti yathākramaṃ nirdiśyate /
T11bsa066_u:984: yadamūrtaṃ vastu tannityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā paramāṇuriti sādharmyadṛṣṭāntatvam /
T11bsa066_u:998: yadamūrtaṃ vastu tannityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā buddhiḥ /
T11bsa066_u:999: buddhau hi sādhanadharmo 'mūrtatvasti sādhyadharmo nityatvaṃ nāsti anityatvādbuddhoriti sūtraprayogaḥ sugama eva /
T11bsa066_u:1001: yadamūrtaṃ vastu tannityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā buddhiḥ /
T11bsa066_u:1017: tataśca nityaḥ śabdo 'mūrtatvādghaṭavadityatra na sādhyadharmo nityatvalakṣaṇaḥ nāpi sādhanadharmo 'mūrtatvalakṣaṇo 'sti anityatvānmūrtatvādghaṭasyeti
T11bsa066_u:1043: yatkṛtakaṃ tadanityaṃ dṛṣṭamiti vaktavye yadanityaṃ tatkṛtakaṃ dṛṣṭamiti bravīti /
T11bsa066_u:1050: yathā hyanityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnāntarīyakatvādiyatra yadyadanityaṃ tattatprayatnāntarīyakam /
T11bsa066_u:1087: sādharmyadṛṣṭāntābhāseṣvādau sādhanadharmāsiddha uktaḥ iha sādhyāvyāvṛtta iti kimarthamucyate? /
T11bsa066_u:1090: vyatirekastu ubhayavyāvṛttirūpaḥ sādhyābhāve ca hetorabhāva iti /
T11bsa066_u:1114: vinā sādhyasādhananivṛttyā prastutaprayoge yadanityaṃ tanmūrtaṃ dṛṣṭamityādilakṣaṇayā /
T11bsa066_u:1118: yathā ghaṭe 'nityatvaṃ ca murtatvaṃ ca dṛṣṭamiti /
T11bsa066_u:1122: viparīto viparyasto vyatireka uktalakṣaṇo yasmin sa tathāvidhaḥ /
T11bsa066_u:1125: prastutaprayoga eva tathāvidhasādharmyadṛṣṭāntayukte vyatirekamupadeśayan yadanityaṃ tanmūrtaṃ dṛṣṭa miti vaktavye yanmūrta tadanityaṃ dṛṣṭamiti bravīti /
T11bsa066_u:1130: tathā hyanityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvādityatra yadaprayatnānantarīyakaṃ tannityamiti /
T11bsa066_u:1142: ātmapratyāyanārthaṃ punaḥ pratyakṣamanumānaṃ ca dve eva pramāṇe /
T11bsa066_u:1149: tathāhi bauddhānāṃ dve eva pramāṇe pratyakṣānumāne /
T11bsa066_u:1160: kalpanā vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇā sā apoḍhā apetā yasmāt tat kalpanāpoḍham /
T11bsa066_u:1167: tacca nirviṣayamapi bhavati ata āha arthe viṣaye /
T11bsa066_u:1171: iha yaduktaṃ kalpanāpoḍhamiti tatsvarūpābhidhānata eva vyācaṣṭe nāmajātyādikalpanārahitam /
T11bsa066_u:1182: na hyarthe śabdāḥ anti tadātmāno vā yena tasminpratibhāsamāne te 'pi pratibhāserannityādi /
T11bsa066_u:1188: yathendriyasāmarthyājjñānamutpadyate tathā viṣayasāmarthyādapi tatkasmādindriyeṇaiva vyapadeśo na viṣayeṇeti? /
T11bsa066_u:1194: asādhāraṇena ca loke vyapadeśapravṛttiryathā bherīśabdo yavāṅkura iti /
T11bsa066_u:1198: manovijñānādyapi pratyakṣamityuktaṃ na ca tadanena saṃgṛhītamiti kathaṃ vyāpitā lakṣaṇasya /
T11bsa066_u:1209: agniratra dhūmāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvāt tadanumānamiti /
T11bsa066_u:1229: savyāpāravatkhyāteḥ pramāṇatvamiti saha vyāpāreṇa viṣayagrahaṇalakṣaṇena vartate iti savyāpāram /
T11bsa066_u:1236: viṣayākāraṃ jñānamutpadyamānaṃ viṣayaṃ gṛṇhadevotpadyate iti pratīteḥ grāhakākārasya pramāṇateti /
T11bsa066_u:1237: anye tu saṃścāsau vyāpāraḥ sadvyāpāraḥ pramāṇavyavasthākāritvātsannityucyate /
T11bsa066_u:1238: so 'syā vidyata iti sadyāpāravatī śeṣaṃ pūrvavat vyācakṣate /
T11bsa066_u:1243: yajjñānaṃ ghaṭaḥ paṭa iti vā vikalpayataḥ śabdāropitamutpadyate /
T11bsa066_u:1252: hetvābhāso hi bahuprakāra uktaḥ asti vādibhedena /
T11bsa066_u:1253: tasmāt hetvābhāsāt yadanumeye 'rthe dharmaviśiṣṭe dharmiṇi jñānam avyutpannasya asiddhādisvarūpānabhijñasya bhavati tadanumānābhāsam /
T11bsa066_u:1268: tasya pratyakṣaviruddhahetvādeḥ prakāśanaṃ prāśnikapratyāyanaṃ na tudbhāvanamātrameva /
T11bsa066_u:1273: abhūtamavidyamānameva tadyataḥ sādhanadoṣaṃ sāmānyanodbhāvayanti prakāśayanti yāni tāni jātidūṣaṇābhāsāni /
